attributes.action: Reverse the decision to scrap the UK Carrier-based defence capability
attributes.additional_details:
The decision to scrap the UK's Aircraft Carrier and Harrier Fleet is short-sited and means that the UK has no seaborne aircraft defence capability for the next 10 years.

The ability to project the UK armed forces overseas - particularly in remote UK dependencies - is significantly compromised by this decision.

This petition requests the government to re-instate the Carrier fleet until the Queen Elizabeth Class carriers and F-35 Aircraft are ready for active serviec
